评论详情: This is the perfect spring dress! The back is so pretty and I've gotten many compliments. It's definitely a light and airy dress so wear it on a warmer day! Overall very pleased.
I bought it for my senior photos and it was very cute!! It’s not tight around the waist and good length. I bought a size medium :)

Beautiful dress exactly how it shows.  Check the size chart and follow it … honestly down size a size . Got the dress based on the information. And it was at least a full size too big.  Still beautiful and someone else got to enjoy it since it didn’t fit
I was looking for a white dress to wear in my cruise.  Cute and comfortable.
One of my favorite dresses. Comfy. Flattering. Love it so much!

It is flattering. I have a smaller chest, big butt, and thick thighs. Oh and a big back! Big back, big back! Sing it with me! 😅 lol The back part of the dress exposed only the small of my back which was perfect. Height: 5'1" Weight 185lb My measurements are: 40" Bust 36" Waist 48" Hips The dress hits right at the knee. The fabric is not stretchy but it does have a stretchy elastic around the back of the waist area. I probably could have ordered a large. It was comfortable and worth the price. The color is a true red. It arrived a bit wrinkled but not too bad. I washed it and it was still a tiny bit wrinkled but I didn't bother ironing. I think it wrinkles were not that noticeable. I have thought about ordering in another color and possibility trying the large.

This dress was perfect. Just as described. I typically wear a large and the medium fit perfect. It was very breathable and comfortable. I washed it regularly with other clothes and it washed very well too! Color was just as the picture showed.  Great deal!!

This has become one of my favorite dresses. I was concerned it would not fit since I’m plus size.  Not only did the dress fit, it was very flattering. Whenever I wear it, I get so many compliments. I event sent the link for my friend to get one.

I bought this for my graduation ceremony. It looked so cute in pictures. I recommend bigger chested ladies to wear a skin colored strapless bra with it because tying it won’t be enough to keep the girls up. I also recommend pasties with this dress as it is a bit see through in the top. 10/10

I wore this for my bridal photos and it was so elegant!! Very good material, super breathable. It was flattering and looked great with my cowboy boots! It also can be off the shoulder or on the shoulder which is super fun!
The color is extremely off I ordered the green and it’s definitely more of a blue
Super pretty dress, good quality, not itchy, beautiful color. Not see through at all. I wore it to a wedding and I got a ton of compliments! You won’t regret buying.

评论概述: Nice Graduation dress, with a bit of help from Mom...

This dress is comfortable,, you can’t see through it I know it was a great price because I have eight I believe different colors

LOVE LOVE LOVEDDDD this dress it was soo cute paired with boots , the back of the dress was the look I was going for , the sleeves were a bit big but maybe bc I ordered a medium , I am 5’4 and 130 lbs , would really recommend

I ordered this dress in a sage green, but it actually turned out to be more of a seafoam/turquoise blue instead. However, I still do like the color, but it was not what I wanted. I wanted the green shade, not blue. With that being said, otherwise the dress fits true to size & it’s very cute! Would have reviewed higher based on the quality/fit if it had not been for the inaccuracy of the color.

We have an Apple Harvest dinner and my teen daughter wanted a simple, red dress.  This by far meets the expectation!  It’s color I was prepared to be a little orange toned based on the picture but it’s NOT at all which was a bonus.  True to size and great price!
You need this dress I received so many complements and it fits perfectly!!!! I got a small and it works even though I usually run extra small. Also not see through at alll!!!!! Love love love it!

Love this pretty spring and summer dress! Great for any occasion! Very comfortable and looks great! 💗
Got this dress for my engagement photos but it’s so hard to find a bra or shapewear that works with this dress.  Everything shows sadly due to the shape of the dress.
Not a bad dress - the sleeves and the rouching are not horribly flattering at all but generally not a bad dress.
I absolutely love this dress!
Very cute dress.  Nicely made but I was not crazy about the open back.
This is a great dress!! I love it and it’s so comfy and flowy. The sizing is accurate.

Very cute. I have received lots of compliments on it. It’s just a little short for my taste. I just wear biker shorts underneath to solve that problem. Otherwise, the material is nice, no issues with quality.
Value exceeded our expectations color was perfect
So feminine and pretty. Not see through at all. It was perfect for my engagement pictures.

评论概述: Cozy enough for a summer outdoor wedding!
评论详情: This is one of the most beautiful dresses I have bought. It's so comfortable. You can wear it off the shoulder or pulled up for a square neck. Either way is stunning. The back is open and tied, so sticky bra may be necessary for some. I know there is a way to tie over the bra, but I'm not skilled enough.  It's so flowy and breathable. It was perfect for the outdoor summer wedding. I got the Large, and I'm 5ft tall. It fit PERFECTLY for my height and weight, which is no small feat. I highly recommend it

I absolutely love this dress! Bought it for vacation and it was so flattering and comfy. True to size, accurate color. Worked for 85 degree weather, not too heavy, great when we entered AC buildings. I was able to actually tie the back over my bra and you couldn't tell. The material doesn't wrinkle in my suitcase, i did hang out up at the hotel. It's sheer but not see through in the color I purchased.  It was super breezy as we walked the beach and the skirt stayed put! I even recommended this dress to a friend for her vacation. If you're teetering, just get it, it's worth it.
The sleeves are not my favorite part but it's still a nice dress and it worked for concert black in college

Got this to layer for a Renaissance Faire getup. I got an XL, I'm 5'6" and 210, fairly evenly distributed. XL was my Amazon recommendation and was a perfect fit. Made the girls look huge, nice bonus. Fabric is light and airy. Layered great with a vest and tulle skirt. Cute enough and stayed unwrinkled enough for me to wear it solo for dinner after all day and a rainstorm at faire. Definitely got thin and sheer when wet LOL but the skirt has an additional shift layer that kept my decency intact. 10/10 will buy more colors. I did need assistance tying the back sufficiently.

I purchased this dress in red. It's very, very cute. I don't tie it in the back, like the picture indicates. I smooth out the back, wrap it completely around and tie a little knot in the front. It looks very natural and adds a little something to the front of the dress. I would definitely recommend this product and I might be purchasing another one in a different color.

This was one of the prettiest dresses I’ve worn to country themed events. It is very flowy,  comfortable, and the fabric quality is durable (not like paper thin or easy to wrinkle), also perfect for square dancing. Got a lot of compliments of it!

Bought this dress for a bachelorette weekend in Savannah GA and it was soo cute. There is elastic cuffs around the sleeves to which I just pushed up to my elbows to create a puffy sleeve since I found that they were a bit odd fitting around my long arms. Not quite 3/4 length. Found the fabric wasn’t too transparent which allowed me not to worry. I personally found it quite comfortable and the quality was well made. There wasn’t a smell when I opened the package!! The fabric does wrinkle a bit but I think it’s mostly how I packed it in my suitcase and didn’t hang it up after arriving. The color was spot on from the ad! Highly recommend and I’ll likely be buying more styles.

评论概述: Still love this dress over a year later!
评论详情: I have never left a review but I was thinking back to this day and I adore this dress! So comfortable and made me feel pretty. Highly recommend 😊
I bought this dress for my college graduation and it was perfect! I would recommend sizing up instead of sizing down like what the other reviews are saying. So worth the price and I would buy again!

This dress is a must buy. The price is great for the quality you are receiving. It’s true to size and comfortable. Open back so I opened to use body tape rather than a bra and it worked great. It comes very wrinkled but taking a steamer to it worked well. It’s light weight and the color is accurate.
This dress is super cute, but the texture can be scratchy especially for sensitive/dry skin or in the summer heat. If you don’t have sensory issues, go for it.
Beautiful good 👍 fabric don't need a slip order (2)
This dress was fantastic. My daughter wears it all The time. It is very flattering and was very affordable. We will be buying more of this type of dress.

It is cute easy and light u can adjust the sleeves on ur arm where they sit and is super cute

Have someone help with the tie in the back. Loved it

评论概述: Very little stretch and runs small
评论详情: I really loved this dress for its appearance, I feel like this is the perfect summary picnic / go lay in the park and read a book kind of dress. My only issue with it is if you're a woman who has more curves on your body, be it on the top half or the bottom half, this dress is going to be very short in the back and very tight in the top. The bow detail in the back is adjustable and makes the top curves less of an issue but in the back you're just going to have to wear shorts underneath to keep from showing too much. If you don't have very pronounced curves I think this will fit you like a dream.
I ordered this for my daughter for a tea party themed bday party. We ordered it Friday afternoon and it was there by early morning Saturday. It fit perfectly!
I got this dress for my bridal shower and it was sooo cute! I got an xl, i’m about 4’11 and 190lbs and it fit really well

This adorable dress is a *bit* short for a 5'9" gal, but it's not *too* short!  I also love that it's lined, so there's no transparency.  The waistline is very flattering, and the open back keeps you cool on warm days.

Bought this for my daughter graduation. The fit is very flattering.  True to size,

Loved this deed! Wore for Easter and a wedding!
I'm 5'6" with longer legs and unfortunately, this dress is not good for that. This barely covered my private areas! While I loved the look, it is not practical to wear this dress out.

Wanted to love this dress. Buy couldn't. The bow in the back is hard to tie because is made of slick material. It didn't look good when it is tied.  The fabric was VERY see through, and even though it had a slip under the skirt, I could still make out my underwear in it and see my skin through the top.  The overall look was cute,, but the fabric choice leaves a LOT to be desired. Don't buy it.
Sadly I have to return this dress as the size is too big, I will reorder a size down to see if it fits better, but I do love this dress, the fabric is fantastic
Bought this for my daughter. We liked the color, but the length was short.
As described great materials
I love the fit and style I bought 3 more of them. Perfect and very flattering dress for the summer ☺️

I ordered this dress because I had nothing to wear to an engagement party. I am petite and usually dresses like this have too much fabric, but this was a great amount. Good quality, comfortable, and cute!

The quality on the dress feels little cheap. I intended to wear it off the shoulders, but the elastic was too long/loose and it kept falling below my elbows and dragging down the top of the dress. I had to safety pin the length on both shoulders so it would stay on my arms

I just got the dress today and I’m already in love! I can’t wait to wear it to a wedding in a couple weeks. I’m 5’3, 135 lbs, 34DD and got a small. It fits really nice with some stretch in the tummy area. It ties in the back so I’m going to have to figure out what bra to wear. That’s the only downfall. Definitely thinking about buying another one in a different color!

I bought this dress for my daughter to wear for Easter. She really likes it and the fit is really nice as well. She is 5’3 and the dress is a perfect length. The back is very nice too with the added bow.

This dress is very pretty. Color was vibrant, skirt is lined so not see through. Feminine and cute for many different kinds of events. Just too small in the bust for me so I returned. May size up and repurchase.

i love this dress so so much! it’s genuinely one of my favourite dresses I own and I have been able to wear it for many occasions. the back is a little difficult to tie by yourself so make sure you have someone to help you!

This romper is soooo precious! I love the strings in the back that I can tie. It is an “open” back but the material to tie is thick so it covers a good bit of your back. I wore this while 20ish weeks pregnant and it was so precious!

Got this to wear for Easter and it's gorgeous. Material is good quality and it's very flattering. Fit true to size and looks exactly as pictured. Not itchy or uncomfortable in the elastic parts of the sleeves. Great value for the money.
I’m 170 I bought a size large fits amazingly!

It's a very beautiful dress. Looks just like the picture. I love how it looks on me.  However, it stains INCREDIBLY easily. I get a new stain almost every time I wear it, not from food, but from water. I leaned against the counter, and the tiniest amount of water left a big stain. I love this dress it is truly beautiful! I am tall so it was on the shorter side but I just wore shorts underneath it was all good

I loved this dress! It is more yellow in person but I love it! It was a really nice fabric and arrived with no wrinkles! The shape fit me perfectly!
Such a cute dress - wore it for my friend’s bachelorette party. It was simple enough for a casual dinner but wasn’t too plain
This dress was super cute and flattering. Used it for engagement photos and loved the way they turned out!
Bought for my daughter she loved it… She wore it to a birthday party and received lots of complements.

评论概述: Cute but order a size down
评论详情: I made the mistake in ordering the size that Amazon recommended for me (an XL). For me the Amazon sizing recommendations are always off but for whatever reason I trusted it this time. The dress was way too big on me. I should have ordered a medium. The sleeves are baggy but the rest of the dress was ok. The dress has a decent stretch to it (like 3 or 4 inches) and the tie on the back makes the sizing more flexible. Personally, I would suggest sizing down especially if you are in-between sizes.  Other than ordering the wrong size, this dress is super cute! I like the pattern and color that I ordered. It is a flowy, casual/business casual dress - perfect for summer or warmer spring/fall days. It was the perfect length for me. The material was thin but not see-through.

I ordered this dress along with a few others for a relatively casual event. I thought it may be too dressy for the event, but brought it as a backup. It was comfortable, cute, and actually has great coverage. Since I wasn’t planning on wearing it I only had dark underwear with me, but thankfully they didn’t show through, which was surprising since I have the baby blue color dress. I got a ton of compliments on it and ended up wearing it again for my sister’s bridal shower. I’ve washed it on delicate in cold water in a lingerie bag and air dried each time with no issues.

I bought this dress since I just wanted a basic black dress, and although the fabric is sensory friendly, it does run very short. Since I cannot wear this dress without having some sort of shorts underneath, I don't wear it all that often. Would reccommend if you're a rather short person, not if you're 5'10 like me.

It’s so hard to find a dress that the larger chest community can wear and it is the best one! The material is great and thick enough without being too thick. It also has an elastic band around the waist making it a great fit! I bought in a second color because this dress is so perfect
Cute dress for an evening out.
Returned, this was not like expected

I bought this dress as something cute for me to wear during the summer. I think the dress is adorable! The fabric can be a little uncomfortable at times, but that’s really only a problem if you have sensory issues with texture. I, personally, don’t like when there is fabric touching my joints so I just make sure the sleeves are above my elbows. I will also say that my bra shows a little at the back where the tie is. It doesn’t bother me, but if you are someone who doesn’t like your bra showing, it’s something worth noting. You could always go bra-less, but I would much rather just have it peaking a little at the back.
This dress is well made and is very cute and flattering on. Not totally sheer (a good thing). I highly recommend.
